title: 'Disappearing' property
description: This indicator is the basis for the verification of the declared data, as a result of which, based on the reasons for non-declaration, the specialist carrying out the verification of the declaration will present his conclusion on the presence or absence of the need for a complex analysis.

title: Irrelevances with state repositories
description: This indicator is the basis for the verification of the declared data, as a result of which, based on the reasons for non-declaration, the specialist carrying out the verification of the declaration will present his conclusion on the presence or absence of the need for a complex analysis.

title: Receipt of dividend without declaration of security and other investment
description: This indicator is the basis for the verification of the declared data, as a result of which, based on the reasons for non-declaration, the specialist carrying out the verification of the declaration will present his conclusion on the presence or absence of the need for a complex analysis.

title: Mismatch of expenses and income
description: This risk indicator is the first important indicator that the declarant has a side and undeclared source of income. In the application of the indicator, the concept of basic expenditure is of key importance, which is the means by which a person takes care of his daily basic needs and those under his financial responsibility.

title: Quantitative deviation of owned/occupied property from the average
description: This indicator is aimed at identifying declarants with abilities outside the general norm. Each property requires a specific investment for acquisition, as well as mandatory costs for maintenance and maintenance over the years, which is subject to assessment in the case of a large number of properties.

title: Significant savings held in cash and cryptocurrency
description: Savings held in cash or cryptocurrency are more risky, as their source of origin and subsequent realization are uncontrollable, and their real existence is not subject to verification, as a result of which declarants can declare savings that do not actually exist, with which they will later justify their gains.

title: Signing transactions of alienation of individuals/registered organizations residing abroad
description: Transactions of alienation of all types of property, where the address of the other party to the transaction is located abroad.
